container-title: 2. Open Visual LISP. 3. Click Open File on the Visual LISP Standard toolbar and open ab35-b.lsp from the AutoCAD 2004
title: PROGN, and a Counter 1. Open AutoCAD with any new drawing
Save the file as ab35-03.lsp in \AutoCAD 2004\Support or any folder in the support file search path. Figure 35-4 shows this routine
Type print0to10 ↵. Press F2 to open the AutoCAD Text Window and see the result
